info.name: Canta-Darker pour Mastodon
info.description: A dark, easily customizable theme for your Mastodon instance. 7 declared colors can be changed globally. Updated to account for Mastodon 4.
info.additionalInfo:
I lost access to my original account and thus cannot update the theme there anymore. It is now here.

3 easily changed settings :

1. Main colors variables
2. Scrollbars width
3. display presence of media alternative text
